definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

catty/(PRC) weight equal to 500 g/(Tw) weight equal to 600 g/(HK, Malaysia, Singapore) slightly over 604 g

to refract/refraction/to reflect (in the figurative sense: to show the nature of)
to toss from side to side (e.g. sleeplessly)/to repeat sth over and over again/to torment sb/to play crazy/to squander (time, money)
winding/(fig.) complicated
shift in the trend of events/turnaround/plot shift in a book/turn in the conversation

sentences.english: I'll fold it to make a hat for Dad as Christmas gift.
sentences.chinese: 我會用它折一頂帽子給爸爸作爲聖誕禮物。

sentences.english: The roaring wind damaged a big tree.
sentences.chinese: 叫嘯着的狂風把一棵大樹都吹折了。

sentences.english: Then untying the fagot , she gave them the sticks to break one by one.
sentences.chinese: 接着她解了捆，一根一根地給他們折。

sentences.english: Three points must be specified for a corner curve segment.
sentences.chinese: 必須爲折角形曲線段指定三個頂點。

sentences.english: And I plucked a hollow reed.
sentences.chinese: 而我折一枚空心的蘆杆。

sentences.english: Learn how to fold an origami samurai hat.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何折一折紙武士帽。

sentences.english: Bring paper from the long side of the box, up to the middle of your package.
sentences.chinese: 從禮物盒長的一邊拿起紙，往上折向中央。

sentences.english: If you buy two. I'll gibe you a discount.
sentences.chinese: 如果買兩條，我給你打個折。

sentences.english: Wash and cut large straw mushrooms into halves. Make a cross cut on the  stalks of small ones.
sentences.chinese: 草菇洗淨，大粒折切開邊，小粒的在菇腳鎅一十字。

sentences.english: I adjusted the shade so the lamp would shine its light out the window onto the cherry blossoms, turning them almost white.
sentences.chinese: 被我折了方向的燈翼，光源投往窗外照白半樹枝櫻花。

sentences.english: A mansard roof with sides that are nearly perpendicular.
sentences.chinese: 屋面接近垂直的一種折線形屋頂。

sentences.english: Jiang does not have to fold the first willow, it was with knitted brows for frown.
sentences.chinese: 江頭楊柳不須折，那與愁眉替得顰。

sentences.english: Pluck flowers as they bloom; wait and you'll have only the twigs.
sentences.chinese: 花開堪折直須折，莫待無花空折枝。
那位騎士的槍頭是橫刺而折的。

sentences.english: This mat is too big for the room, it laps over at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 這張席子放在屋裏太大，四邊都折了起來。

sentences.english: The small note was so tightly folded it was about the size of a penny.
sentences.chinese: 這個小便籤折的只有一便士那麼大。
